articles.title: DnD rival Pathfinder’s newest book lets you play as pigeon-sized dragons - wargamer.com
articles.description: Dungeons and Dragons isn’t the only RPG to feature big, scaly beasts – a fact that Pathfinder’s recently announced dragon book celebrates.

PlayStation: PS5's top 3 selling games in April 2025 were all from Xbox - Windows Central
articles.description: In an ironic twist of fate, Sony has announced PlayStation 5's top 3 best-selling games for April are all Microsoft-owned titles like Oblivion Remastered, Minecraft, and Forza Horizon 5.

articles.title: Google has funny response to those saying the new iPhone 17 camera bar steals from Pixel - PhoneArena
articles.description: Google has a humorous reaction to those who say the iPhone 17 Pro rear camera bar resembles the camera housing on Pixel models.

articles.title: Update ASAP: Google Fixes Android Flaw (CVE-2025-27363) Exploited by Attackers - The Hacker News
articles.description: Google’s May 2025 Android update patches 46 flaws; one critical bug exploited since March via FreeType.
